title: Ep 117: Hardest Decision Ever Made
description:
In This Episode: A man's helpful excel sheet falls into nefarious hands, a mom asks her ex to cancel his vacation to help with their child, a couple gets into a fight over a once in a lifetime event (a really cool party), and a listener takes action and holds a landlord accountable (Josh doesn't agree). And we look for answers to some of the dumbest questions on the internet.
Use Code Judgies149 at EveryPlate to get your first box for $1.49 a meal
